ValidationRule.description: Minimum amount has to be less than or equal to Maximum amount
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ucinn_ascendv2__Minimum_Amount__c != NULL, IF( ucinn_ascendv2__Maximum_Amount__c != NULL, IF(ucinn_ascendv2__Minimum_Amount__c <= ucinn_ascendv2__Maximum_Amount__c, false, true) , false) , false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Minimum amount has to be less than or equal to Maximum amount
